definition: troops under one's command/subordinate/affiliated to a ministry
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
category/genus (taxonomy)/family members/dependents/to belong to/subordinate to/affiliated with/be born in the year of (one of the 12 animals)/to be/to prove to be/to constitute
to join together/to fix one's attention on/to concentrate on

sentences.english: To guide the ideology education work and culture construction for the youth of the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 指导部属单位青年思想教育工作和青年文化建设。

sentences.english: To guide the discipline inspection on the institutions affiliated to the Ministry and the railway work styles.
sentences.chinese: 指导部属单位纪检监察工作，以及路风监察工作。

sentences.english: to inspect and guide the ideological and political building of the leading groups for institutions affiliated to the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 检查指导部属单位领导班子的思想政治建设。

sentences.english: To be responsible for the check and guide of the retired official affairs of the Ministry departments.
sentences.chinese: 负责对部属单位执行离退休干部工作政策的检查指导。

sentences.english: An Influence of Communication Patterns on The Quality of Leader-Member Relationship in Organizations …
sentences.chinese: 组织沟通模式对主管与部属关系品质的影响。

sentences.english: It is clear that the highest art of command is subordinates can command themselves.
sentences.chinese: 要清楚指挥的最高艺术，是部属能够自我指挥。

sentences.english: Never misrepresent a subordinate's performance during performance appraisals.
sentences.chinese: 在评估绩效时，千万不要错估了部属的表现。

sentences.english: You should know that, the highest art of commanding is that your subordinates can command themselves.
sentences.chinese: 要清楚指挥的最高艺术，是部属能够自我指挥。

sentences.english: The United States now has at its disposal the ultimate human-computer interface.
sentences.chinese: 美国现在正处于它的最终人机交互界面的部属中。

sentences.english: The prayerful deployment of the Church could prove the decisive factor.
sentences.chinese: 教会在世界各地所部属的代祷勇士将成为决定性关键。

sentences.english: Mr. Odinga has called for the deployment of international peacekeepers from the African Union or United Nations.
sentences.chinese: 奥廷加呼吁非盟或联合国部属国际维和人员。

sentences.english: to guide the administrative work of the finance accounting of the institutions affiliated to the Ministry.
sentences.chinese: 指导部属单位财务会计管理工作。

definition: aids and advisors of top officials
